definition: rose-tinted sky or clouds at sunrise or sunset
clouds at sunset glowing like fire

sentences.english: The sunset glow is just like a picture.
Whenever the evening, I would climb the roof to watch sunset.
sentences.chinese: 每当傍晚，我都会爬上房顶去观看晚霞。

sentences.english: The sunset glow tinted the sky red.
A sort of halo, an occidental glow, came over life then.
sentences.chinese: 那时候，就有一种祥光，一片晚霞。

sentences.english: The early sunset was slanting across the park .
sentences.chinese: 初现的一抹晚霞斜映着花园。

sentences.english: Asaka not to go out, sunset line thousands of miles.
sentences.chinese: 朝霞不出门，晚霞行千里。

sentences.english: The afterlight captured over a hill in Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 在爱丁堡郊区的山上拍摄的美丽晚霞。

sentences.english: A red sky at night is indication of fine weather of the following day.
sentences.chinese: 红色晚霞是第二天好天气的预兆。

sentences.english: It was a lovely evening and the soft light of spring covered the earth.
sentences.chinese: 这是个可爱的傍晚，春天柔和的晚霞洒向大地。

sentences.english: As the sun went down the whole sky became suffused with a red glow.
sentences.chinese: 当太阳西沉时，整个天空布满了一片红色晚霞。

sentences.english: Sunset sincere commendable, healthy price is higher, want to enjoy the old fu, movement to hold.
sentences.chinese: 晚霞诚可贵，健康价更高，欲图享老福，运动要抓牢。

sentences.english: A golden afterglow throbbed in the west.
sentences.chinese: 金色的晚霞在西方颤动着。

sentences.english: You could see the flat tops of the pine trees, and the evening light was upon the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 你能看到松树们平平的树顶，而晚霞映红了层云。

sentences.english: The envoy was accompanied by his wife, Chen Wangxia.
sentences.chinese: 大使由他的夫人陈晚霞陪同。

sentences.english: I saw the sunset everyday of my life.
sentences.chinese: 我生掷中的每一天都看着晚霞。

sentences.english: The afterglow is shining magnificently in the sky and the Chang’an City has already vanished from my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 天边的晚霞一片绚烂，长安城早已没有了踪影。

definition: the sun sets in the west (idiom)
variant of 餘暉|余晖[yu2 hui1]
nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
multicolored sunlight of sunrise or sunset
